sentences.sContent: I ghosted his weekly rugby column for the Telegraph.
sentences.sContent_eng: I ghosted his weekly rugby column for the Telegraph.
sentences.sCn: 我为他代写《电讯报》每周的橄榄球专栏。

sentences.sContent: U8 is the least of all group, but they all worked hard, and never be late, it is obvious to see their deep love to rugby.
sentences.sContent_eng: U8 is the least of all group, but they all worked hard, and never be late, it is obvious to see their deep love to rugby.
sentences.sCn: U8的人数是所有组里面最少的，但是他们都十分努力从来不迟到。他们对橄榄球深深地热爱是显而易见的。

remMethod.val: rug(地毯) + by → 在地毯一样的草坪上玩橄榄球

trans.tranOther: an outdoor game played by two teams with an  oval (= egg-shaped )  ball that you kick or carry
